original_title: Kandy-Matale road temporarily closed at Akurana due to fire
original_body_lines: The Kandy-Matale road (A9) has been temporarily closed at Akurana due to a fire that broke out in a shop at Akurana and has spread to several adjacent shops in the vicinity, according to police.
Accordingly, motorists are kindly advised to use alternate routes to avoid inconveniences.
